00116     /*! Formats the data into a string.
00117      * @param buffer The buffer to fill.
00118      * @param count The size of the buffer.
00119      * @param format The format string.
00120      * @param value1 The first value to add.
00121      */
00122 #ifdef USE_OLD_SWPRINTF
00123 #define FormatString1(buffer, count, format, value1) swprintf(buffer, format, value1)
00124 #else
00125 #define FormatString1(buffer, count, format, value1) swprintf(buffer, count, format, value1)
00126 #endif

00135 #ifdef USE_OLD_SWPRINTF
